page.title: 13Herb Growing in Buckden
page.content: The Hoo is a large house surrounded by gardens covering half an acre, owned by Mr. and Mrs. Peplow. It has become recognised as a centre for herb cultivation. The business started from the selling of vegetables on the doorstep, of which herbs becaame a part and soon the main attraction. Mr. Peplow is now the Administrator of the British Herb Association and he and his wife have written several books. One and a half workers are now employed in the office and garden. People write to the Hoo for special cultivation packs or information sheets and sometimes day courses are held. The grounds include several show gardens such as the Agatha Christie garden full of poisonous herbs and another with herbs from the bible. The most popular herb sold is an insect repellent called Penny Royal.
